item.title: Contact Me - Eric Carlisle : UI Developer, UX Designer
item.author: eric@ericcarlisle.com (Eric Carlisle)

item.title: Eric Carlisle : UI Developer, UX Designer
item.author: eric@ericcarlisle.com (Eric Carlisle)
item.description: About Me As a UI Developer and UX Designer, my passion is in building the user-facing web and the experiences that make it engaging, compelling, and useful. My core approach is to Keep It Stunningly Simple, a practice encouraging creative innovation while maintaining pragmatic focus. Via this careful balance, outstanding solutions can be created with highest probability of project success. Over the past 20 years I've worked in many aspects of web production.
